biotools.summary: Software tool for constructing, simulating, and exploring models of gene regulatory networks. It is an open source, extensible Java application that allows users to rapidly build ordinary differential equation models of a gene regulatory network without requiring extensive programming or mathematical skills.

bioschemas.name: Ingeneue
